name: Mariusz Jan Skobel

Proficient in **HTML**, utilizing **C#** and **C++** to effectively solve complex problems through algorithms and data structures. Experienced with modern frameworks and libraries such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. A collaborative communicator passionate about creating systems that deliver significant real-world impact.
